alert.note: Alert for Marion; Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 09 at 6:29PM CDT until August 09 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL MARION AND SOUTHWESTERN WINSTON COUNTIES... At 629 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hamilton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Lynn, Brilliant, Weston, Lake Buttahatchee, Twin, Natural Bridge, Pearces Mill, Rankin Fite Airport, Byrd, Marion County Public Lake, Piney Grove and Pikeville. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
